00002 #include "PostlistBuilder.hpp"
00003 #include "PostlistWriter.hpp"

00005 using namespace aitools::invertedindex;

00007 BOOST_AUTO_TEST_SUITE(postlist_writer);
00008 
00009 BOOST_AUTO_TEST_CASE(explicit_ctor)
00010 {
00011         BOOST_CHECK_THROW(PostlistWriter("/does/not/exist"), std::invalid_argument);
00012         bfs::path path("test.postlist.writer");
00013         PostlistWriter writer(path);
00014         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(writer.tell(), 0);
00015         BOOST_CHECK(writer.ready());
00016         writer.close();
00017         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(writer.tell(), 0);
00018         BOOST_CHECK(!writer.ready());
00019         bfs::remove(path);
00020 }
00021 
00022 BOOST_AUTO_TEST_CASE(write_empty_postlist)
00023 {
00024         PostlistBuilder builder;
00025         Iterator::SharedPointer iterator(builder.build());
00026         bfs::path path("test.postlist.writer");
00027         PostlistWriter writer(path);
00028         for (unsigned i(0); i != 10; ++i)
00029         {
00030                 writer.write(iterator);
00031         }
00032         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(writer.tell(), 10 * Iterator::sizeof_header);
00033         bfs::remove(path);
00034 
00035 }
00036 
00037 BOOST_AUTO_TEST_CASE(write_non_paged_postlist_with_constant_value_size)
00038 {
00039         ByteBuffer buffer(1);
00040         unsigned length(100);
00041         PostlistBuilder builder;
00042         for (unsigned i(0); i != length; ++i)
00043         {
00044                 builder.append(buffer);
00045         }
00046         Iterator::SharedPointer iterator(builder.build());
00047         bfs::path path("test.postlist.writer");
00048         BOOST_CHECK(!iterator->is_paged());
00049         PostlistWriter writer(path);
00050         for (unsigned i(0); i != 10; ++i)
00051         {
00052                 writer.write(iterator);
00053         }
00054         size_t size(Iterator::sizeof_header + iterator->payload());
00055         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(writer.tell(), 10 * size);
00056         bfs::remove(path);
00057 }
00058 
00059 BOOST_AUTO_TEST_CASE(write_non_paged_postlist_with_variable_value_size)
00060 {
00061         ByteBuffer buffer;
00062         unsigned length(100);
00063         PostlistBuilder builder;
00064         for (unsigned i(0); i != length; ++i)
00065         {
00066                 buffer.resize(i);
00067                 builder.append(buffer);
00068         }
00069         Iterator::SharedPointer iterator(builder.build());
00070         bfs::path path("test.postlist.writer");
00071         BOOST_CHECK(!iterator->is_paged());
00072         PostlistWriter writer(path);
00073         for (unsigned i(0); i != 10; ++i)
00074         {
00075                 writer.write(iterator);
00076         }
00077         size_t size(Iterator::sizeof_header + iterator->payload()
00078                         + (iterator->length() * Iterator::sizeof_value_size_t));
00079         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(writer.tell(), 10 * size);
00080         bfs::remove(path);
00081 }
00082 
00083 BOOST_AUTO_TEST_CASE(write_paged_postlist_with_constant_value_size)
00084 {
00085         ByteBuffer buffer(110);
00086         unsigned length(100000);
00087         PostlistBuilder builder;
00088         for (unsigned i(0); i != length; ++i)
00089         {
00090                 builder.append(buffer);
00091         }
00092         Iterator::SharedPointer iterator(builder.build());
00093         bfs::path path("test.postlist.writer");
00094         BOOST_CHECK(iterator->is_paged());
00095         PostlistWriter writer(path);
00096         for (unsigned i(0); i != 3; ++i)
00097         {
00098                 writer.write(iterator);
00099         }
00100         size_t size(Iterator::sizeof_header + iterator->payload());
00101         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(writer.tell(), 3 * size);
00102         bfs::remove(path);
00103 }

00105 BOOST_AUTO_TEST_CASE(write_paged_postlist_with_variable_value_size)
00106 {
00107         ByteBuffer buffer;
00108         unsigned length(5000);
00109         PostlistBuilder builder;
00110         for (unsigned i(0); i != length; ++i)
00111         {

00113                 builder.append(buffer);
00114         }
00115         Iterator::SharedPointer iterator(builder.build());
00116         bfs::path path("test.postlist.writer");
00117         BOOST_CHECK(iterator->is_paged());
00118         PostlistWriter writer(path);
00119         for (unsigned i(0); i != 3; ++i)
00120         {
00121                 writer.write(iterator);

00123         size_t size(Iterator::sizeof_header + iterator->payload()
